615 40,944 16,758 8,372 28,491 53,621 30,099 13,360 51,106 94,565 1,098 1,098 4,603 4,603 7,011 7,011 2,756 2,756 1,952 1,952 8,413 13,121 75 134 477 106 108 611 825 *Wounded and evacuated. *Missing, interned, and captured.   ## p. 610 (#634) ############################################    ## p. 611 (#635) ############################################  Appendix 5 Total Battle Casualties in European Theater of Operations December 1941 to August 1945 Officers Enlisted Personnel Total Personnel Died Wounded* Missing* Total Died Wounded* Missing Total Died Wounded* Missing* Total 1941 Dec 1 1942 Jan Feb 17 11 1 12 19 8 3 30 1 12 19 7 5 31 336 30 9 3 42 26 8 9 43 Mar 1 1 1 1 Apr 4 2 3 Ã€ 1 2 7 May 1 1 1 1 4 Jun 1 1 Jul 5 3 8 14 1 41 4 1 4 5 1 3 2 1 4 1 1 6 9 1 4 14 Aug 18 1 2 21 1 1 18 2 2 22 Sep 13 3 7 23 10 8 10 28 23 11 17 51 Oct 29 1 8 38 21 20 11 52 50 21 19 90 Nov 38 17 18 73 33 25 10 68 71 42 28 141 Dec 38 17 26 81 38 23 24 85 76 40 50 166 Total 1942 165 41 68 274 145 95 72 312 310 136 140 586 1943 Jan 142 33 Feb 151 2328 40 215 182 107 29 56 236 213 Mar 66 23 - 28 117 90 Apr 35 7 105 147 79 12 82 371 324 140 122 586 107 132 452 364 136 188 688 54 34 178 156 77 62 295 26 101 206 114 33 206 353 May 151 47 152 350 265 90 177 532 416 137 329 882 Jun 153 33 191 377 284 83 212 579 437 116 403 956 Jul 201 49 239 489 304 114 331 749 505 163 570 1,238 Aug 130 39 317 486 234 92 407 733 364 131 724 1,219 Sep 139 45 182 366 190 67 280 537 329 112 462 903 Oct 256 49 476 781 414 114 709 1,237 670 163 1,185 1,185 2,018 Nov 180 51 246 477 261 112 288 661 441 163 534 1,138 Dec 204 52 420 676 313 181 531 1,025 517 233 951 1,701 Total 1943 1,808 457 2,452 4,717 2,829 1,147 3,284 7,260 4,637 1,604 5,736 11,977 1944 Jan 329 72 522 923 467 189 675 1,331 796 261 1,197 1,197 2,254 Feb 468 102 812 1,382 587 268 1,223 2,078 1,055 370 2,035 3,460 Mar 452 126 985 1,563 576 203 1,403 2,182 1,028 329 2,388 3,745 Apr 525 187 1,303 2,015 688 332 1,793 2,813 1,213 519 3,096 4,828 May 540 174 1,034
